enhanced_by.reason: Both methods validate IP addresses, with isValidInet6Address potentially delegating to isValidInet4Address for embedded IPv4 addresses.
The RegexValidator is used in both isValidInet4Address and isValidInet6Address, suggesting a common setup step.
The method should be invoked to validate the prefix part of the IPv6 address before isValidInet6Address.
The method should be invoked to validate the zone ID part of the IPv6 address before isValidInet6Address.
